item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

Make a command like this: if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@The rules of Suomirune", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@red@READ ALL OF THE RULES!", 8146); sendQuest("@blu@READ ALL OF THESE RULES!!!", 8147); sendQuest("Rule 1: Don't attack shop NPC's!", 8148); sendQuest("Rule 2: Do Not Ever use NOCLIP OR ULL BE KICKED", 8149); sendQuest("Rule 3: No using multi target spells at shop areas", 8150); sendQuest("Rule 4: No making a summon/pet army then attackign ppl", 8151); sendQuest("Rule 5: No hacking!", 8152); sendQuest("Rule 6: Must obey any mod or admins", 8153); sendQuest("Rule 7: No disobeying Mods or Admins! Unless they abusing!", 8154); sendQuest("Rule 8: No asking for free Mod or Admin or Co-owner!", 8155); sendQuest("@blu@You need to earn staff spots,", 8156); sendQuest("Rule 9: No set-item, set-npc, or set-object!(Auto-ban!)", 8157); sendQuest("Rule 10: No bothering admins or owners when they are busy!", 8158); sendQuest("Rule 11: No whining or complaining!", 8159); sendQuest("Rule 12: Do not mass powerful multi target spells!", 8160); sendQuest(""Rule 13: No asking for unban!", 8161); sendQuest("Rule 14: No attacking allies in clan wars!", 8162); sendQuest("Rule 15: No scamming or jealousy (''this serv sucks'')", 8163); sendQuest("Rule 16: Dont mass pk players that train in wild areas", 8164); sendQuest("There are areas where you can pk as much as you want", 8165); sendQuest("Rule 17: Dont do things that crash other ppls client", 8166); sendQuest("@blu@Rule 18: No constructing in ::home ::pk ::lettya ::wild1-10!", 8167); sendQuest("@dre@Report abusing mods by telling an admin or other mod via", 8168); sendQuest("@dre@private chat, ::tell, ::yell!", 8169); sendQuest("@cya@ENJOY MY SERVER!!! =)", 8170); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic
